links.title: Monday Apple Rumors: iPhone XS & XS Max Have Charging Issues
links.description: Leading the Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) rumor mill today is news of issues with some iPhone XS and XS Max devices not charging. Charging: Some owners of the iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max say that the devices aren't always charging when they should, reports MacRumors. Apple has yet to comment on the issue.

message.body: $AAPL Tests show iPhone XS LTE speeds best iPhone X, can't match Galaxy Note 9 or Pixe... https://goo.gl/3HCK7D

links.title: Tests show iPhone XS LTE speeds best iPhone X, can't match Galaxy Note 9 or Pixel 2
links.description: Though a handful of early iPhone XS adopters are complaining about less-than-desirable cellular reception, a new test reveals Apple's latest flagship smartphones boast much improved LTE performance over last year's model. However, the XS models, which rely on Intel modems, are still behind handsets that use battle-tested Qualcomm silicon.

messages.body: $BABA $AAPL Jack Ma says trade war will hurt everyone https://finance.yahoo.com/m/1ea92854-d80f-3edc-8a5d-b5700e74432a/jack-ma-says-u.s.-trade-war.html?.tsrc=rss

links.title: Jack Ma Says U.S. Trade War to Destroy Commerce, Hurt Everyone
links.description: Jack Ma, the co-founder of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and China's richest man, gave a dire warning that the escalating trade war with the U.S. is going to be severe and long-lived. "It's going to destroy not only China-U.S. trade, it will destroy a lot of small businesses," Ma said during a speech at the World Trade Organization on Tuesday.

links.title: Momentum Monday - Small Caps Under Pressure
links.description: All charts on Momentum Monday are powered by MarketSmith We continue to trade in a market of stocks environment.
